Reference

Estimating Genetic Liability

Functions used to estimate the genetic liability in a range of different setups with and without family history and prevalence information.

estimate_gen_liability()

Estimate genetic liability based off of family history and temporal information.

estimate_gen_liability_ltfh()

Estimate genetic liability similar to LT-FH

estimate_gen_liability_multi_trait()

Estimates genetic liability based off of multiple phenotypes, family history, and temportal information.

estimate_gen_liability_noFH()

Estimate genetic liability similar to LT-FH

estimate_gen_liability_noFH_corr_traits()

Estimate genetic liability similar to LT-FH

Example functions

Collection of functions used as examples of how to include additional information

age_to_cir()

Calculate cumulative incidence rate based off of a person's age (Used for Examples)

cir_to_age()

Calculate a person's age based off of the cumulative incidence rate (Used for Examples)

age_to_thres()

Calculate thresholds based off of a person's age (Used for Examples)

age_to_thres_trunc_normal()

calculate the thresholds of an individual based off of an individual's age using the truncated normal distribution (Used for Examples)

est_cir()

Estimating the cumulative incidence rate in sample

liab_to_aoo()

Calculate a person's age of onset based off of the true underlying liability (Used for Examples)

liab_to_aoo_case_trunc_normal()

calculate the age of onset for cases based off of the true underlying liability using the truncated normal distribution (Used for Examples)

trunc_normal_cdf()

Cumulative density function of a truncated normal distribution (Used for Examples)

Auxiliary functions

Helper functions used when estimating the genetic Liabilities.

rtmvnorm.gibbs()

Gibbs Sampler for the truncated multivariate normal distribution

check_positive_definite()

Verifies that the covariance matrix is positive definite (a properti of gaussian covariance matrices) by checking if all eigen values are positive.

generate_corr_matrix()

Constructs the correlation matrix

generate_cov_matrix_noFH()

Constructs the covariance matrix for LT-FH without Family History, and correlated traits

get_between_trait_cov()

Helps construct the correlation entries in the covariance matrix needed for LT-FH++ with multiple traits.

get_cov()

Creates the covariance matrix needed for LT-FH++

get_full_cov()

Helps construct the correlation entries in the covariance matrix needed for LT-FH++ with multiple traits.
